cannedResponses.name: Meeting Invitation Response
cannedResponses.body:
Dear {{ Name }},

Thank you for inviting me to your meeting at {{ Meeting Time }} on {{ Meeting Date }}. Unfortunately, I will be busy working and will be unable to attend.

cannedResponses.name: Project Request Response
cannedResponses.body:
Dear {{ Name }},

Thank you for inviting me to work on {{ Project Name }} for you. I will have to decline as I have several projects of me own to attend to.
